variables-intro_key2: VARIABLE is a memory/location in which the data is stored. Whose value we can change that is called a VARIABLE. You can give any name to the VARIABLE and you can store anything in the variable.
variables-intro_key3: Just as we can store 123 in a VARIABLE named as variable_x.
variables-intro_key4: Similarly we can put 9999 in a VARIABLE named as a.
variables-intro_key5: As you remember that 123 and 9999 are INTEGERS.
variables-intro_key6: We can give another value to variable_x, by this variable_x will be updated. As you can see below that we have given a value 9.9 to the variable_x now.
variables-intro_key7: As you remember that 9.9 is float. That means we can give different values to a variable. Value of a is not changed because we have not updated it. Now we can update a and make a new variable b.
